metadata.title: CVE-2024-25081 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Splinefont in FontForge through 20230101 allows command injection viacrafted filenames.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-25081` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fontforge - 1:20170731~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
fontforge-common - 1:20170731~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
fontforge-nox - 1:20170731~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libfontforge2 - 1:20170731~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
libgdraw5 - 1:20170731~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
python-fontforge - 1:20170731~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: fontforge package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:20170731~dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm1').
